channel.title: |~*Run And Compile Trouble*~|
channel.description:
well i followed this tut for makin a server [URL=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?PHPSESSID=e7c8051303bhttp://www.a20fe3d7440f447954da8&topic=643.0]moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?PHPSESSID=e7c8051303bhttp://www.a20fe3d7440f447954da8&topic=643.0[/URL] wen it comes to the part to run & compile i got this message
The device is not ready. The device is not ready. Press any key to continue...
i also followed the javec error tut thats stikied on sythe [URL=http://www.sythe.org/showthread.php?t=146710]http://www.sythe.org/showthread.php?t=146710[/URL]
so here my questions...
Do u know how i can fix it?? and
I think i got the JDK and JRE but can sum1 attach the install or send me a link directly to the JRE im pretty sure i got JDK but iunno bout JRE Heres the ones i have installed [img]http://img108.imageshack.us/img108/4529/servertroublewu5.png[/img]
Thx in advance :)
I just moved this from the tutorial section cuz i made a mistake ignore the other post i made[br][size=1]Posted at: July 23, 2006, 02:14:24 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: |~*Run And Compile Trouble*~|
item.dc:creator: @jmull jmull
item.description:
@jmull wrote:

[quote=“Shinnok, post:8, topic:5943”]yeah i think it works…once tryed it.
jdk bin is in program files,java folder,once inside you will see some folder,click on the one named jdk1.5.0_07 or whateve rversion of jdk you have,and when you are inside you will see bin folder,thats where you put compile.or run&compile[/quote]

yaz no offense to shinnok but I’d ignore that and leav eit as is this will basically accomplish nothing, it would work, but the way you have now is better.

now about the no-ip thing. If you have the no-ip DUC runnign and set to update your server or you have your current ip set for the subdomain you chose then yes you can use it to get onto your server.

Read full topic

@jmull wrote:

yes that means it worked

and shinnok that’s only if you have it as javac.exe instead of the full file path. and editing the .bat with the full file path means you have the freedom to place it anywhere you want. besides either way he would have had to edit it.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 24, 2006, 02:10:08 AM[/size][hr]yaz, all that would do is restrict where you can place your server source files and make some more work. wat you have now if the smarter way to go.

item.title: |~*Run And Compile Trouble*~|
item.dc:creator: @jmull jmull
item.description:
@jmull wrote:

you did make sure to edit the variables and lines of code to run update 7 right? cuz they were set to run update 6.

if not heres the code for 7:

.bat code:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe” server
pause

environment variables:

Classpath:
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
Path:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin

and if you have make sure you changed both 6’s to 7’s in path variable

Read full topic
